apply_alpha_mct(alpha)¶

For now, pushes the distribution via loc.

apply_alpha_non_ATFM(alpha)¶

Assumes location is 0.

apply_alpha_tat_mean(alpha)¶

We modify the mean so as sig/mean is constant. Mean of expo((x-loc)/lambda) is lambda + loc. Sdt is lambda.
